TopicTitle: create a way to set default launching site

Articles.Content:
Back when there was a VAB and an SPH, you would default to either the launch pad or the runway depending on where you are.  Now, you always have to select. This would be okay if you selected once and it remembered your choice, but I cannot count the number of times I accidentally loaded a plane onto the launchpad.  Occasionally it would go back to the place I had just been, but often it just reset.

 

A minor issue, but a quality of life suggestion for down the line.
